textBeforeTable: Nutritional Data Suitable for Coeliacs; Suitable for Vegetarians; Suitable for Vegans; Organic Dietary Information Organic Wholegrain Rice Allergy Advice: For allergens see highlighted ingredients Ingredients Free From Gluten, Free From Wheat Allergens can be found in the ingredients list Allergen Information Nutrition Country of Origin Belgium Country of Packing Belgium Manufacturer Kallo Foods Ltd, River View, Surrey, GU17 9AB. Package Type Plastic Wrap Brand Kallo Storage Store in a cool dry place. Once opened, reseal and store in an airtight container to retain freshness. Instructions Made in a factory that handles sesame seeds, soya and milk. Preparation and Usage A Perfect Plan with Cream, Cheese & Parma Ham! We recommend three rice cakes per serving. Equally delightful just crumbled up into some homemade tomato and basil soup. Or why not load them with some sliced red and yellow peppers and a few delicious dollops of tuna mayonnaise?
